data.text: @Death_Of_Nuance Historically we're just about ready for another "wave" so I would guess she's hanging on to it all so she can point and say I told you so. Pressure required to not allow her to do that.
@Death_Of_Nuance Hopefully we get an announcement March 10th before Spring break that theyâ€™re gone. Not sure what 10 days does ?

@Death_Of_Nuance "20 people died today WITH Covid"

Never FROM Covid.

@Death_Of_Nuance I see a problem if orders are lifted before school breaks, which are rife with risky travel and partying. That's what spiked cases in both the previous years. it's what shut down my entire town. 

The emergency may be over but the smart money looks to avert another one. #bcpoli
@Death_Of_Nuance Actually she did have things to say .. just not what you wanted her to say.

@toshiromifuneOK Yeah I literally just wrote this to someone:

These people don't get it. The fact that we have the highest vaccination rate in the world is why we should have been one of the first to get rid of restrictions, not the last.

@Death_Of_Nuance Really odd how we did relatively well in terms of severity of NPIs compared to most other provinces, but now we're one of the few holdouts.

Horgan/Dix probably want to hold the line for a bit longer for appearance's sake.
@Storyspell I'll defer that question to the @bcndp and @CDCofBC.
@Death_Of_Nuance 'based on the data in our pandemic'.  What data in our pandemic shows masks are effective? What data shows vaccine passes are doing any good at all?
So yeah, she had absolutely nothing to say.
